message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.LG

This paper deals with the problem of computation task scheduling in mobile edge computing systems, which involves optimizing the delay and power consumption of tasks. This problem is related to several areas of computer science, including networked systems (cs.NI), distributed computing (cs.DC), control systems (cs.SY), information theory (cs.IT), and machine learning (cs.LG). However, given the focus on wireless communication and mobile devices, we believe that cs.NI is the most likely category, followed by cs.DC and cs.SY. The use of optimization techniques and decision-making algorithms also suggests a connection to cs.IT, while the proposed one-dimensional search algorithm may be related to cs.LG.
